name: MPLAB COFF File
summary: Learn about .COF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: COF files are created from the MPLINK linker component, which takes object .O files, library files, and a linker script to produce the executables. Two other files are created as well with the ".map" and ".hex" extensions.
NOTE: The COFF format is not unique to MPLAB IDE. However, MPLAB IDE uses the ".cof" extension for its COFF files. COFF files also use the .OUT extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
